description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Notable works include the blog 'Across Space And Time' and the course 'Groom Your Ecosystem.'
blurb: The term 'ecosystem' has transcended its biological roots to describe new forms of human organization that are less hierarchical and more dispersed, necessitating a new practice called ecosystem architecture.
